articles.description: Rangers are now just one tie away from the Champions League - but Russell Martin's men have had luck on their side.
articles.title: Rangers in the Champions League: Russell Martin's men do what they need to

articles.description: BBC senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel looks at how Tottenham are shaping up for the season under new manager Thomas Frank.
articles.title: Tottenham: Thomas Frank brings 'glass half-full' philosophy to Spurs before new season

articles.description: Newcastle United complete the signing of AC Milan and Germany defender Malick Thiaw for a reported £34.6m.
articles.title: Malick Thiaw: Newcastle United sign defender from AC Milan

articles.description: Everton sign Manchester City and England winger Jack Grealish on a season-long loan.
articles.title: Jack Grealish transfer: Everton complete loan signing of Manchester City and England winger

articles.description: Liverpool step up their bid to sign Crystal Palace and England centre-back Marc Guehi.
articles.title: Marc Guehi: Liverpool set to step up bid for Crystal Palace captain

articles.description: Man City hold talks with Gianluigi Donnarumma, Southampton reject West Ham's offer for Mateus Fernandes and Galatasaray approach Brazil goalkeeper Ederson, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Donnarumma, Fernandes, Ederson, Wharton, Asensio, Konate

articles.description: American sprinter Sha'Carri Richardson says she will seek help following her arrest over allegations of domestic violence.
articles.title: Sha'Carri Richardson to seek help following airport arrest

articles.description: Real Madrid issue a statement to strongly reject plans to play Villarreal's La Liga match with Barcelona in the United States, saying it "sets an unacceptable precedent".
articles.title: La Liga: Real Madrid strongly reject plans to play Villarreal-Barcelona match in USA

articles.description: Newcastle striker Alexander Isak is still determined to join Premier League champions Liverpool before the transfer window closes.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United striker determined to join Liverpool

articles.description: Two late Ollie Palmer goals see Wrexham come from behind to force penalties in the Carabao Cup first round and beat Hull in the shootout.
articles.title: Wrexham 3-3 Hull City (5-3 pens): Hosts through on penalties in Carabao Cup after late Palmer heroics
